meaning: Pass an exam / Succeed in the examination
description: In ancient imperial examinations, the list of successful candidates (Bang) was written on a golden placard (Jin Bang).

examples.chinese: 愿今天一切顺顺利利,锦鲤护体,金榜题名
examples.translation: Wish everything goes smoothly today, lucky koi protects you, and you pass the exam

examples.chinese: 一起为高考加油！祝莘莘学子,金榜题名,前程似锦
examples.translation: Cheer for Gaokao together! Wish all students pass the exam and have a bright future

examples.chinese: 祝看见这条的朋友们金榜题名,顺利上岸,高考必胜
examples.translation: Wish friends seeing this pass the exam, successfully land ashore, and win the Gaokao
